name: FilterValue

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the localized display name of the filter value. Possible values for this name are restricted based on the data type of the column being filtered.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the unique API name of the filter value. Possible values for this name are restricted based on the data type of the column being filtered.

description: Contains information about a filter value, such as the display name and API name.
